metadata.title: CVE-2018-19967 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x on Intel x86 platforms allowing guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host OS hang) because Xen does not work around Intel's mishandling of certain HLE transactions associated with the KACQUIRE instruction prefix.

criterions.comment: xen package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
